protocol.text: The data were normalized with RMA algorithm using Gene-Spring GX default analysis settings ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity
Seedlings were treated with 4 μg/ml BLM and/or low INA (10 μM)
Arabidopsis seedlings were grown on MS plates at 21-24�C, 16-hour day length, 60% relative humidity.
Total RNA was isolated using RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen)
RNA probes were labelled using MessageAmp Premier RNA Amplification Kit (Ambion).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A).
GeneChips were scanned using the Axon Genepix Scanner (Genepix 4000B).
